ðŸ“– Summary: Open-CUAK is a platform for managing automation agents at scale, focusing on reliability. It allows users to run automation workflows locally, leverage vision-based automation, and utilize various vision-compatible models. Key features include dedicated remote browsers for security and browser extension integration.
